Contact List REST API on FastAPI
  • Schemas
  • View page source

Schemas

The Pydantic schemas define the data validation and response models, including:

  • ContactBase, ContactCreate, ContactUpdate, ContactInDB: Schemas for creating and updating contact information.

  • UserBase, UserCreate, UserInDB: Schemas for user registration and user information.

  • Token: Schema for access and refresh tokens in authentication.

  • AppConfig: Schema for configuration settings loaded from environment variables.

class app.schemas.AppConfig(_case_sensitive=None, _nested_model_default_partial_update=None, _env_prefix=None, _env_file=PosixPath('.'), _env_file_encoding=None, _env_ignore_empty=None, _env_nested_delimiter=None, _env_parse_none_str=None, _env_parse_enums=None, _cli_prog_name=None, _cli_parse_args=None, _cli_settings_source=None, _cli_parse_none_str=None, _cli_hide_none_type=None, _cli_avoid_json=None, _cli_enforce_required=None, _cli_use_class_docs_for_groups=None, _cli_exit_on_error=None, _cli_prefix=None, _cli_flag_prefix_char=None, _cli_implicit_flags=None, _cli_ignore_unknown_args=None, _secrets_dir=None, *, POSTGRES_DB, POSTGRES_USER, POSTGRES_PASSWORD, SYNC_DATABASE_URL, REDIS_HOST, REDIS_PORT, DATABASE_URL, SECRET_KEY, EMAIL_USER, EMAIL_PASS, EMAIL_FROM, SMTP_SERVER, EMAIL_PORT, FRONTEND_URL, CLOUDINARY_NAME, CLOUDINARY_API_KEY, CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET, CLOUDINARY_URL)[source]
